title: Can we all agree that Kandy Kayn needs to be a thing?
body:
I mean, it should be a given. PLZ RITO Kandy{{champion:141}} 
at least for christmas.

replies.body:
Ooohhhh, that's clever {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} 

I'm still holding out for a Yeezus skin :D

Please don't encourage this nonsense. This is the tenth such thread.

[Look at this thread instead.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/mAL4OIAd-new-kayn-skin-dark-candy-kayn) It at least tries to be innovative.

ikr this has been a running thing ever since he was released on pbe and it can be so annoying to see 2-3 of the candy kayn skin ideas in concept and creations all claiming that they just came up with it

Either Candy Kayn or Dark Candy Kayn. Rito pls

Anyways, this pun exploded approximately one day after he was revealed. If this isn't on a sticky note somewhere in Riot HQ underlined with red ink and surrounded by exclamation points the skin team was taking a looong nap after making Soulhunter (and I don't blame them... every Kayn skin is essentially comprised of 3 skins at once).
The name is clever but no... That just wont do.
